name: OneMoreRoom
description:
It is highly recommended to play in full screen!

OnemMoreRoom is a dice-comboing deck-building Roguelike where defeating the Boss in only half of the journey!

If you want to check out how the development goes, look below into my Development logs! Soon I will also organise a Disscord server so stay tuned ^^

In OneMoreRoom you set onto an adventure into the underground to slay a monster. Firstly you explore and get stronger. At the end of the tunnel you face the Evil and destroy it! But after that you have to return to the surface.

Credits:

Design, Programming, Sounds - Me!

Background Art - WojdArt - Facebook

Music - Bartonator - Youtube
